rules_text:
Trample, haste
When Sahra, the Consuming enters or attacks, sacrifice a permanent.
At the beginning of your end step, transform Sahra unless you've sacrificed two or more permanents this turn.
rules_text2:
Indestructible
Whenever Cyrukan attacks, choose one –
• Create a Treasure token. [i](It's an artifact with “{T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.”)[/i]
• Create a Weapon token and attach it to target creature you control. [i](It's an Equipment artifact with equip {2} and “Equipped creature gets +1/+1.”)[/i]
At the beginning of each end step, if you control three or more tokens, transform Cyrukan.
